Description: RPG-style "Metroidvania". During one session, role-playing games with my friends Daniel excommunicated in the dressing room, when suddenly finds himself in a dark room of a medieval castle! As a veteran gamer, he is surprised at first a little something, and continues to roam the corridors of the deadly, cynical mocking a dark spirit who had to move into his body ...

Unepic is a Metroidvania-style platformer RPG, designed to resemble 80's and 90's games but with better lighting effects, sound, and visuals. It includes randomly-generated weapons, light-and movement-based stealth, and RPG-style skills and inventory management.
In Unepic, you play Daniel, a gamer with some bad habits and a jaded attitude toward games, women, and life in general. During an RPG session with his friends, he retreats to the restroom - and finds himself in a medieval castle. And things just get progressively stranger from there.
Unepic treats its own genre with a tongue-in-cheek sarcasm, going so far as to break the fourth wall and address the player. It pokes fun at adventure games, MMOs, and tabletop RPGs. It even has a twist ending, turning an anticipated fight scene into something deeper.
In Unepic you will find more than 100 weapons to hit and slain anything that crosses your way.
A single weapon is not valid for everything. Depending on the monster you face, one class of weapon will be much better than others.
